movement: go [direction] - Move in a direction (north, south, east, west)
n / s / e / w - Shortcut directions
go [location] - Move toward a named location
actions: look [item] - Examine a specific item or person
search - Search the area for hidden items
drop [item] - Drop an item from your inventory
use [item] - Use, eat, or drink an item
equip [weapon/armor] - Equip a weapon or wear armor
interaction: give [item] to [person] - Give an item to someone
barricade - Fortify the current location (needs 2 wooden planks)
combat: attack - Strike the enemy with your equipped weapon
defend - Reduce incoming damage for one turn
use [item] - Use an item during combat (medicine, etc.)
survival: rest / sleep - Rest and heal (safer in barricaded areas)
status - View your stats, day, and escape route progress
system: save [1-3] - Save your game to a slot
map - View nearby locations (requires a map item)

tips: Explore the hotel thoroughly before venturing outside.
Always equip a weapon before leaving safe areas.
Night time is dangerous - zombies are more active after dark.
Search rooms to find hidden items.
Talk to every survivor you meet - they have vital information.
Keep your hunger and thirst under control. Thirst kills faster than hunger.
Barricade safe rooms to rest without interruption.
There are 4 escape routes out of Paris. Explore to discover them.
